titles.title: There’s a wideness in God’s mercy

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: There’s a wideness in God’s mercy, Like the wideness of the sea; There’s a kindness in His justice, Which is more than liberty.

verse.name: v2
v3
verse.lines: There is plentiful redemption In the blood that has been shed; There is joy for all the members In the sorrows of the Head.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: For the love of God is broader Than the measure of our mind; And the heart of the eternal Is most wonderfully kind.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: If our love were but more simple, We should take Him at His word; And our lives would be all sunshine In the sweetness of our Lord.
